model

Class TileFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.TileFactory

  • public class TileFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    This class allows to establish which type of tile there will be in a specific position and sets its characteristics.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TileFactory(int rows, int columns)
      Constructs a TileFactory.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      Tile createForCoordinates(int row, int column, int tileDimension)
      Creates a new tile for the specified coordinates.
      void setDoor(java.util.Set<Tile> walkableTiles)
      Sets a random tile's type equals to the closed door.
      void setKey(java.util.Set<Tile> rubbleTiles)
      Sets the powerup of a random tile equals to the key.
